entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Nanisivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 a.m. EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arctic Bay Airport 10:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
